title: Smart Data Models - ExcAC3A
description: Adapted from CIM data models. Modified IEEE AC3A alternator-supplied rectifier excitation system with different field current limit.

type.description: Property. NGSI type. It has to be ExcAC3A

efdn.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Value of at which feedback gain changes (Efdn).  Typical Value = 2.36. Default: 0.0

ka.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Voltage regulator gain (Ka).  Typical Value = 45.62. Default: 0

kc.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Rectifier loading factor proportional to commutating reactance (Kc).  Typical Value = 0.104. Default: 0.0

kd.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Demagnetizing factor, a function of exciter alternator reactances (Kd).  Typical Value = 0.499. Default: 0.0

ke.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Exciter constant related to self-excited field (Ke).  Typical Value = 1. Default: 0.0

kf.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Excitation control system stabilizer gains (Kf).  Typical Value = 0.143. Default: 0.0

kf1.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Coefficient to allow different usage of the model (Kf1).  Typical Value = 1. Default: 0.0

kf2.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Coefficient to allow different usage of the model (Kf2).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

klv.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Gain used in the minimum field voltage limiter loop (Klv).  Typical Value = 0.194. Default: 0.0

kn.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Excitation control system stabilizer gain (Kn).  Typical Value =0.05. Default: 0.0

kr.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Constant associated with regulator and alternator field power supply (Kr).  Typical Value =3.77. Default: 0.0

ks.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Coefficient to allow different usage of the model-speed coefficient (Ks).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

seve1.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Exciter saturation function value at the corresponding exciter voltage, Ve, back of commutating reactance (Se[Ve]).  Typical Value = 1.143. Default: 0.0

seve2.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Exciter saturation function value at the corresponding exciter voltage, Ve, back of commutating reactance (Se[Ve]).  Typical Value = 0.1. Default: 0.0

ta.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Voltage regulator time constant (Ta).  Typical Value = 0.013. Default: 0.0

tb.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Voltage regulator time constant (Tb).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0

tc.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Voltage regulator time constant (T).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0

te.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Exciter time constant, integration rate associated with exciter control (Te).  Typical Value = 1.17. Default: 0

tf.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Excitation control system stabilizer time constant (Tf).  Typical Value = 1. Default: 0

vamax.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Maximum voltage regulator output (V).  Typical Value = 1. Default: 0.0

vamin.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Minimum voltage regulator output (V).  Typical Value = -0.95. Default: 0.0

ve1.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Exciter alternator output voltages back of commutating reactance at which saturation is defined (Ve1) equals Vemax (Ve1).  Typical Value = 6.24. Default: 0.0

ve2.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Exciter alternator output voltages back of commutating reactance at which saturation is defined (Ve).  Typical Value = 4.68. Default: 0.0

vemin.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Minimum exciter voltage output (Vemin).  Typical Value = 0.1. Default: 0.0

vfemax.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Exciter field current limit reference (Vfemax).  Typical Value = 16. Default: 0.0

vlv.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Field voltage used in the minimum field voltage limiter loop (Vlv).  Typical Value = 0.79. Default: 0.0
